alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 4:35PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Collier, northern Mainland Monroe, northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shark Valley Obs Tower, or 17 miles northwest of The Redland, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fortymile Bend, Dade-Collier Training Airport, and Big Cypress National Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
